price: Yeroo mallattoo argan gara galaniiti “(kun) sihrii ittifufaa” jedhu.
arabic: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yaraw āyatan yuʿ'riḍū wayaqūlū siḥ'run mus'tamirrun
